body: We are aware of the issue and working on resolving it. I removed above workaround in https://github.com/lukeiwanski/tensorflow/commit/1a1525bae9a7e57a3faa2ed8e8a70de9dff3747f where I am registering Fill operation with .HostMemory("value"). Is that acceptable for time being?
